entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 12:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to a few flurries near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
